title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. B, ch. I, subch. D, pt. 62 - Sale Of Alcoholic Beverages At Open Stands Or Counters
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. B, ch. I, subch. D, pt. 62 - Sale Of Alcoholic Beverages At Open Stands Or Counters

State Regulations
§ 62.1 - Sales at open windows restricted
§ 62.2 - Exceptions

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. B, ch. I, subch. D, pt. 62

Statutory authority: Alcoholic Beverage Control Law, §§ 2, 106[3]
State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
